text: Let's Dance 2018 is the thirteenth season of the Swedish celebrity dancing TV- series Let's Dance, the season premiered on TV4 23 March 2018. The show is presented by Tilde de Paula Eby and David Hellenius.Här är alla deltagare i ”Let’s dance” 2018 Aftonbladet Retrieved 28 February 2018 English dancer Aaron Brown from the UK version of Strictly Come Dancing competes for the first time.Britt Ekland & Aaron Brown Britt Ekland & Aaron Brown == Couples == {|class="wikitable" sortable" style="text-align:center;" !Celebrity !Known for
